vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
λάχᾰνον [λᾰ], τό,
mostly in plural, garden-herbs, opposed to wild plants, vegetables, [Refs 5th c.BC+] not a single herb, [Refs 5th c.BC+]; ἐν τῷ λ. τούτῳ, i.e. the lettuce, [Refs 4th c.BC+]
__2 in plural also, the vegetable-market, [Refs 5th c.BC+]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
plant, herb, vegetable
a garden herb, vegetable, Mt. 13:32; Mk. 4:32; Lk. 11:42; Rom. 14:2*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: legumbre, hortaliza, planta de huerto, verdura, vegetal
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 可食用的香料植物,蔬菜
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 可食用的香料植物,蔬菜
